Name: Pet Vet 3D Wild Animal Hospital
About the game: Be animal doctor to cute baby elephants, frisky zebra foals, adorable lion and leopard cubs and more! Help them get better by examining them and helping them heal. Get them on the road to recovery by feeding, training and playing with them. Itâ€˜s more fun than ever as you learn all about these amazing wild animals and build up your very own veterinary practice! Features: 3 levels of challenging game play! Lots of wild animals including zebras, elephants, leopards, lions, and more! Diagnose and treat animal ailments! Earn a good reputation with pet owners and watch your business grow! Play in freestyle or story mode! Great 3D graphics and animations! Play as Doctor or Animal Keeper! Examine! Investigate the symptoms and find out what's wrong. Diagnose! What does your animal patient have? It's up to you to get your patients on the road to recovery! Create your own look by choosing clothes, hairstyles and even create your wilderness dream house! Work with your zebras on their jumping skills.
